name: Sacrificial
description:
This game was created for the gamedevtv May 2022 game jam

The theme was: Death is only the beginning

The game is a standard 2D platformer with turrets, spikes, wall hops, and jump pads. What makes it unique is when you die, your corpse remains and you can interact with it. Corpses can be used to hold down buttons, provide cover from turrets, and create bridges over spikes.
